Judul: DEVELOPMENT OF A WEB BASED ASRS WAREHOUSE MANAGEMENT IN A JIT PRODUCTION SYSTEM
Abstrak:
Material distribution is one of the most crucial process in a supply chain. This study aims to create a web-based application to manage the distribution of materials in a production system. The application was modeled from Automatic Storage and Retrieval System, an automatic warehouse that contains autonomous components such as automated transportation within the warehouse. The application was implemented in the Production Lab of ITB’s Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering Faculty and can also be implemented in several other industries if needed.
The development of this web application used the Python programming language and the Django Framework. It also uses the SQLite database language to store and retrieve data. The ASRS was modelled using the Unified Modelling Language (UML) class diagram and use case diagram. The function that the website aimed to achieve are automated purchases of materials based on workstation needs, automated distribution of materials and provide a database of all objects and items in the system.
This study starts by modeling an ASRS using UML use case diagram, UML case diagram and a physical design model. Afterwards, the model is used to develop a code using the Django framework. This resulted in the creation of a web application with the goals stated above.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Prof. Dr. Ir. Yatna Yuwana Martawirya
Kata Kunci: ASRS, Just In Time, Django, Web Development, Unified Modelling Language, Python.
